title: Who owns the intelligence layer of your AI model?
description: Thousands of organisations have outsourced the intelligence layers that determine how AI behaves – with potentially dismal consequences.
content: Frontier models are driving the concentration of power at an unprecedented pace, with AI leadership often misconstrued as the culmination of progress, control, and safety. But every system that centr… [+3284 chars]
